description: There's nothing quite like a Lemon Drop Martini to bring the sunniest of days indoors. If you're looking for an easy cocktail recipe that packs a punch, this lemon-flavored concoction is just what you need. The ingredients are inexpensive and straightforward, which means that any night can become extraordinary with this delightful drink!
name: Lemon Drop Martini

recipeInstructions.name: Coat the rim of the martini glass with sugar. Let it rest.
